title: RE: Been more than 48 hours, no response on ticket.
body:
Porocles responded asking for the ticket info but it keeps telling me "login to comment" even though I'm logged in so I made a new post

Porocles or other red: The ticket number is #23465053

replies.body: Your posting is really strange, so I'll look into what's going on with that.  In the meantime, I looked into your ticket for you!  It's been successfully received and sent to our account team.  It may be a bit due to the current queue, but make sure you don't reply to it as that would bump you back to the bottom.  We'll assist and reply to the ticket as soon as we can!
